post.text: This is a moment when we all need to stand together. Watch live as Hillary speaks on the terrorist attack in Orlando.

comment.author: Parker
comment.text: I cant trust her judgement on fighting terrorism. Her actions helped destabilize the middle east allowing groups like ISIS to grow and recruit. I won't vote for you.

replies.author: Cameron
replies.text: Parker you can keep Trump when he loses it just shows who people are. Just take him far from USA

replies.author: Parker
replies.text: I'm not for Trump either. The man is crazy.

replies.author: Coleton Jay
replies.text: Please do some independent research. Then come back with facts. The good she had done far outweighs the negative decisions made by the administration she represents. That's right. She was not queen Hillary. She was working for a president.

replies.author: Parker
replies.text: I am talking about her vote as a senator. When she didn't have the courage nor judgement to stand up and do her job and do the right thing. Do not tell me to do my research. I have, and she will not get my vote.
